UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT SOUTHERN DISTRICT OF NEW YORK

vs.

NOTICE OF APPEARANCE
To the Clerk of this Court and all parties of record:
Please enter my appearance as counsel in this case for Defendant Ghislaine Maxwell. I certify that I am admitted to practice Pro Hac Vice in the above captioned action.
Dated: July 22, 2025 Respectfully submitted,
